verses.1: Topa tungah lungdamna ko un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung hi.
verses.2: “Ama itna kip tawntung hi,” Israel-te in ci ta uh hen.
verses.3: “Ama itna kip tawntung hi,” Aaron innkuante in ci ta uh hen.
verses.4: “Ama itna kip tawntung hi,” amah a zahtakte in ci ta uh hen.
verses.5: Ka cihmawhna ah Topa ka sam a, Topa in hong dawngin mun tanzau ah hong koih hi.
verses.6: Topa in kei hong ompih hi. Bangmah ka kihta kei ding hi. Mihingte in kei, bang hong cih zo ding ahi uh hiam?
verses.7: Kei hong huh dingin kei lamah Topa om hi. Kei hong mudahte pen gualzawhna tawh ka en ding hi.
verses.8: Mi i muan sangin Topa belh ding hoih zaw hi.
verses.9: Uliante i muan sangin Topa belh ding hoih zaw hi.
verses.10: Minam khempeuh in kei hong umcih uh hi. Ahih hangin Topaʼ vang tawh amaute ka su gawp hi.
verses.11: Amaute in ka kimkot ah kei hong umcih uh hi. Ahih hangin Topaʼ vang tawh amaute ka su gawp hi.
verses.12: Amaute in khuaipi bangin kei hong umcih uh a, ahi zongin selkeu kuang bangin amaute daikik pak uh hi. Topaʼ vang tawh amaute ka su gawp hi.
verses.13: Kei ka puk nadingin nakpi takin hong kisawn a, ahih hangin Topa in kei hong huh hi.
verses.14: Topa in a vanglian, a thahatin kei hong bawl a, amah pen kei a hong honpa ahi hi.
verses.15: Ngai un! Thuman miteʼ puanbuk sungah gualzawh lungdamna la kisa a, “ Topaʼ taklam khut in a lian nate hih khin hi.
verses.16: Topaʼ taklam khut kipahtawi a, Topaʼ taklam khut in a lian nate hih khin hi,” kici hi.
verses.17: Kei ka si kei dinga, ka nungta ding hi. Topaʼ sepnate ka gengen ding hi.
verses.18: Topa in nasia takin kei hong thuhilh a, ahih hangin kei hong sisak lo hi.
verses.19: Topaʼ tungah lungdamna ko-in ka lut theih nadingin biakinn kongpite kei hong hon in.
verses.20: Hih pen Topaʼ kongpi ahi hi. Thuman mi bek hih kongpi ah lut ding hi.
verses.21: Nangmah in kei hong dawngin, hong hon khia na hih manin nangma tungah ka lungdam hi.
verses.22: Innlamte in a nilkhiat suang pen innkiu suang bulpi suak khinta hi.
verses.23: Hih pen Topaʼ nasepna hi a, eiteʼ mitah lamdang hi.
verses.24: Hih ni pen Topaʼ hong piak ni hi a, eite lungdamin i kipak ding hi.
verses.25: Topa aw, kote hong hon in; hong thum ung. Topa aw, kong thum uh hi; kote hong daupaisak in.
verses.26: Topaʼ min tawh hong pai pa in thupha ngah tahen. Topaʼ inn panin nang kong phat uh hi.
verses.27: Topa pen Pasian ahi hi. Amah in eite tungah nopsakna hong pia zo hi. Na khut uh ah singhiang tawi-in, biakna tau kimkotin pai un.
verses.28: Nang pen keima Pasian na hi a, nangma tungah lungdamna kong ko ding hi. Nang pen keima Pasian na hi a, nangmah kong phat ding hi.
verses.29: Topa tungah lungdamna ko un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung hi.
